name: SND-L6083R
description: UPnP (Auto Port Forwarding), Simple Focus, Defog, DIS support

members.name: Opearating Temperature
members.details:
24V AC : -50°C ~ +55°C (-58°F ~ +131°F)
12V DC, PoE : -20°C ~ +55°C (-4°F ~ +131°F)
*Start up should be done at above -10°C (+14°F)

members.name: Min. Illumination
members.details:
Color : 0.1Lux (1/30sec, F1.2, 50IRE), 0.0017Lux (2sec, F1.2, 50IRE), 0.03Lux (F1.2, 30IRE)
B/W : 0Lux (IR LED on), 0Lux (F1.2, 30IRE, IR LED on)

members.name: Video Output
members.details:
CVBS : 1.0 Vpp / 75Ω composite, 704 x 480(N), 704 x 576(P), for installation
DIP connector type

members.name: Privacy Mask
members.details: Off / On (32 zones with 4 points of polygonal)

members.name: Intelligent Video Analytics
members.details: Tampering, Virtual line, Enter / Exit, (Dis)Appear, Audio detection, Face detection

members.name: Alarm Triggers
members.details: Motion detection, Tampering, Audio detection, Face detection, Video analytics, Network disconnection, Alarm input

members.name: Alarm Events
members.details: File upload via FTP and E-mail, Notification via E-mail, Local storage (SD/SDHC/SDXC) or NAS recording at Event (Alarm triggers), External output

members.name: Video Quality Adjustment
members.details: H.264 : Compression level, Target bitrate level control, MJPEG : Quality level control

members.name: Bitrate Control Method
members.details: H.264 : CBR or VBR, MJPEG : VBR

members.name: Audio in
members.details:
Selectable (Mic in / Line in), Max output level : 1 Vrms
Supply voltage : 2.5V DC (4mA), Input impedance : approx. 2K Ohm

members.name: Protocol
members.details: TCP/IP, UDP/IP, RTP(UDP), RTP(TCP), RTCP,RTSP, NTP, HTTP, HTTPS, SSL, DHCP, PPPoE, FTP, SMTP, ICMP, IGMP, SNMPv1/v2c/v3(MIB-2), ARP, DNS, DDNS, QoS, PIM-SM, UPnP, Bonjour

members.name: Security
members.details:
HTTPS(SSL) login authentication, Digest login authentication
IP address filtering, User access log, 802.1x authentication

members.name: Edge Storage
members.details:
micro SD/SDHC/SDXC
Motion images recorded in the SDXC/SDHC/SD memory card can be downloaded

members.name: Application Programming Interface
members.details: ONVIF profile S, HTTP API (SUNAPI) 2.0, SVNP 1.2

members.name: Webpage Language
members.details: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese, Swedish, Danish, Portuguese, Turkish, Polish, Czech, Rumanian, Serbian, Dutch, Croatian, Hungarian, Greek, Norwegian, Finnish

members.name: Web Viewer
members.details:
Supported OS : Windows XP / VISTA / 7 / 8 / 8.1, MAC OS X 10.7
Supported Browser : Microsoft Internet Explorer (Ver. 11 ~ 8)
Mozilla Firefox (Ver. 19 ~9) * Windows only
Google Chrome (Ver. 25 ~ 15) * Windows only
Apple Safari (Ver. 6.0.2(Mac OS X 10.8, 10.7 only), 5.1.7) * Mac OS X only

members.name: Power Consumption
members.details: Max. 11.0W (Heater off), Max. 17.0W (24V AC - Heater on)
